channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingFederate PingOne MFA Integration Kit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingFederate PingOne MFA Integration Kit

item.title: CVE-2022-23723|2024-08-03T03:51:45.964Z -- ping%20identity -- pingfederate%20pingone%20mfa%20integration%20kit
item.description: An MFA bypass vulnerability exists in the PingFederate PingOne MFA Integration Kit when adapter HTML templates are used as part of an authentication flow.
